entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
